casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
Melvin HESTER, Defendant-Respondent. And Other Related Cases. M-1347/1348/1349 September Term 2017
079228 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 6, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions for leave to file a supplemental brief (M-1347), for reconsideration of the Court's Opinion (M-1348), and for a stay of the Court's opinion (M-1349) are denied.
